BBox(PApplet p, float mass, float posX, float posY, float posZ, float dimX, float dimY, float dimZ)
          if mass is set to 0: the body will be static
BBox(PApplet p, float mass, Vector3f position, Vector3f dimension, boolean inertia)
          if mass is set to 0: the body will be static, if inertia is false, the body will collide, but not rotate
